name: Rigatoni with Italian Chicken
comments: May choose to use pasta sauce instead of diced tomatoes
ingredients: 28 oz. diced tomatoes with Italian herbs
instructions: Dice chicken and place in Ziplock bag; add Italian dressing and marinate 30 minutes. Drain chicken and discard marinade. Meanwhile, cook pasta according to pkg. directions and drain.
Melt butter in skillet over medium heat. Cook chicken and diced tomatoes 15 minutes or so, seasoning with red pepper. Serve over pasta and top with cheese and parsley.
